name: ESTATE of Clara HORWITZ, Deceased. Appeal of Nelson COHEN, Contestant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: ESTATE of Clara HORWITZ, Deceased. Appeal of Nelson COHEN, Contestant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Leonard S. Wissow, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Marvin I. Block, Philadelphia, for Rose Mislove.
David L. Marshall, Philadelphia, for David Gold.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 496
ESTATE of Clara HORWITZ, Deceased. Appeal of Nelson COHEN, Contestant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 16, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Leonard S. Wissow, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Marvin I. Block, Philadelphia, for Rose Mislove.
David L. Marshall, Philadelphia, for David Gold.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
